question: The Union government of India has launched a Swachh Bharat survey in 500 cities and towns. Which one of the following statements is incorrect in terms of the survey rules?
option1: The survey will judge the cities only on the basis of citizen feedback.
option2: The survey will give ranks to the cities based on the level of sanitation standards
option3: The evaluation areas will include information, education and behaviour change of the public
option4: The citizens will be able to give their feedback back through missed calls
answer: The survey will judge the cities only on the basis of citizen feedback.
explanation: No answer description available for this question. Let us discuss.
